description.S1: Byzantium's premiere fashion icon, Celeste Jolicoeur,
description.S2: has hired you to help her create the ultimate outfit -
description.S3: the perfect marriage of the chic and the shocking.

blurb.B1: Speak to Celeste Jolicoeur in Prosperity Plaza of Byzantium and agree to help her to obtain this quest.

description.S1: Celeste needs to see what the rest of Halcyon wears outside of Byzantium.
description.S2: Speak to Celeste while wearing a suit of armor and headpiece from the following sets:

blurb.B1: Acquire Iconoclast Armor and Headpiece, Marauder Armor and Headpiece and Spacer Armor and Headpiece and model them for her.
blurb.B3: she'll ask you to gather some materials.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Ah-ah-ah. Don't speak. Hold that posture for a moment while I admire you. You have a natural contrapposto, my dear.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: The way you rest your weight against your hip suggests a certain rugged charisma possessed only by the mighty primal, and the well-traveled spacer. Splendid! I love it!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You can tell all that by the way I'm standing?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That's me. Rugged and well-traveled.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: There it is. The most pretentious thing I'll hear all day.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Your walk. Your posture. The cut of your clothes. You carry yourself with the bearing of a noble, but you dress like a barbarian. How deliciously outré!

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'm Celeste Jolicoeur. And you, my dear, are exactly what Byzantium needs.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: It's like you read my mind.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Are you trying to sell me something?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What Byzantium needs is to be taken apart brick by brick.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Darling, you and that brutish swagger of yours have been on my mind the moment you stepped into my studio.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'm working on a new line of clothing that will shock this city to its core, and I'd like your help. What do you say, my dear? Care to make history with me?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Sounds like fun. Count me in.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You've got a pretty high opinion of someone you just met.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What do you have in mind?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll think about it.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Marvelous! You and I are going to wake this city up like a cold splash of wine to the face.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: What I need is a survey of the outside world. What does the common laborer wear? How do the wild-eyed madmen of Monarch dress themselves? I've heard rumors, but I require samples.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Also, I expect you to model for me.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What's the benefit of seeing me wear it?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Any excuse to admire my looks, huh? Can't blame you.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm not much for modeling.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: My dear, fashion is a performance art. An outfit without a body is like an instrument without a player.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'll need you to model for me the following: the apparel of an Iconoclast, the armor of a marauder, and a full ensemble of spacer gear. Helmet included.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: And when I say "spacer gear," I mean an outfit worn by real spacers. None of that garbage Spacer's Choice peddles.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: You have the bearing and demeanor of a born model. You're going to absolutely murder this job.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll see what I can do.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Hold on. I need to know more about these outfits.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Fabulous! I can't wait to see what you dredge up.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: I expect you'll cut an exquisite figure. What else do you need to know?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You said something about an Iconoclast's outfit.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Where am I supposed to find spacer gear?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What's so interesting about marauder armor?

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: I've heard rumors of these Iconoclasts, half-mad zealots rampaging across the surface of Monarch.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: You'll have to find your own way into Monarch. I can't help you. Even if I could, I prefer not to interfere with your creative process.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: If I were an enterprising spacer in need of a wardrobe, I'd probably head to the Groundbreaker.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: I don't know. I've never seen a marauder. Not in person anyway. There are always aetherwave programmes, but I want something authentic.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Byzantium is long overdue for a change of wardrobe, my dear. Something barbaric, yet elegant.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Oh, you cad. You'll be the talk of Byzantium once I'm done with you.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Trust me, darling. I've been at this business a lot longer than you.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Everything I need to know can be deduced from a first impression.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: You're an outsider. You're exotic. You carry a whiff of barbarism and adventure. You're the embodiment of everything I want in my new line.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: All right. I'll help you out.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: You. When I look at you, I see the very embodiment of everything the walls of Byzantium were built to keep out.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Making an outfit worthy of you won't be easy. I'll need your help gathering the right materials.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Consider it a standing offer.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'm an artist, darling, not a tweed merchant. I don't "sell things," I pollinate the world with art.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Yes! Perfect! That rakish audacity is exactly what I'm after.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Ah, Celeste. You've done it again. I knew from the moment I laid eyes on you that I'd found my muse.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: You're not afraid of speaking your mind. You smolder and growl. Oh, you are just too perfect.
